      • add

        public void add(User user,
                java.lang.String projID,
                boolean addToDataBase)
         throws java.sql.SQLException,
                java.io.IOException
        Adds the user
        Parameters:
        user - User which should be added
        projID - Project where the user should be added to (foreign key)
        addToDataBase - when its false it will only be added locally. ProjID can be null when this is false
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.io.IOException

      • checkUserId

        public java.lang.String checkUserId(java.lang.String username)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                    java.io.IOException
        Returns the UserID from the Database according to the username
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user
        Returns:
        Returns UserID if username is found. When its not found it will return an empty String
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.io.IOException
